backend/main.mo: Main canister actor implementing access-controlled user profiles and contact form submission storage with spam/junk handling.
backend/migration.mo: Migration script converting optional old reCAPTCHA secret keys into a required Text field for the new actor state.
feature_evidence.json: Feature traceability file mapping implemented features to source files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries of multiple frontend files used for documentation or metadata purposes.
frontend/.env.production.example: Template for production-only frontend environment variables including the reCAPTCHA site key.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based stylesheet defining color variables, dark mode values, and base element styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file that preloads the hero image, sets up DNS prefetch for reCAPTCHA, and loads the React app.
frontend/PRODUCTION_CONFIGURATION.md: Documentation explaining required production configuration steps for reCAPTCHA and backend secret setup.
frontend/PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT_NOTES.md: Short placeholder file for production deployment notes including build instructions.
frontend/SMOKE_TEST_PRODUCTION.md: Production smoke test checklist covering landing page, offer routes, and contact form behavior.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up the app’s TanStack router with lazy‑loaded offer and admin pages, using a root layout and a loading fallback.
frontend/src/components/admin/AccessDeni: Displays an access‑denied message with login or home navigation based on Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactF: Implements a contact form with client-side validation, bot checks, reCAPTCHA v3 handling, and submission via a custom hook.
frontend/src/components/landing/ContactS: Shows the contact information and form, initializing reCAPTCHA only when the section becomes visible via IntersectionObserver.
frontend/src/components/landing/Footer.t: Renders the site footer with branding, social links, contact email, and a WhatsApp CTA.
frontend/src/components/landing/HeroSect: Displays the hero banner with title, tagline, call‑to‑actions, and a visual scroll indicator.
frontend/src/components/landing/LandingP: Composes the main landing page with background image and all major sections such as hero, offers, reviews, contact, and footer.
frontend/src/components/landing/OffersSe: Lists tour feature cards with icons, descriptions, and links to corresponding offer pages.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewCa: Displays a styled review card with star rating, excerpt, and reviewer name.
frontend/src/components/landing/ReviewsS: Renders the landing page reviews section with a grid of ReviewCards and a TripAdvisor CTA.
frontend/src/components/landing/TripAdvi: Provides a styled external link button directing users to the TripAdvisor review page.
frontend/src/components/offers/GetInTouc: Offers a reusable CTA link that routes to the home page and scrolls to the contact section.
frontend/src/content/countryCallingCodes: Exports a list of country calling code options with metadata for each country.
frontend/src/content/curatedReviews.ts: Contains static curated review data with reviewer info, ratings, and excerpts.
frontend/src/content/offersPosts.ts: Defines structured offer post content including metadata and multiple text sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminContactSubmis: Provides hooks to fetch normal and junk contact submissions with admin access handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity auth context, login handling, and identity persistence.
frontend/src/hooks/usePageSeo.ts: Updates document title, meta tags, Open Graph data, Twitter cards, and optional JSON-LD schema for SEO.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecaptchaV3.ts: Hook that loads and initializes reCAPTCHA v3, exposing readiness state and a method to execute actions for tokens.
frontend/src/hooks/useScrollToHashSectio: Hook that scrolls smoothly to an element matching the URL hash on navigation changes.
React Query mutation that submits contact form data via the backend actor and refreshes admin submission queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining color variables, dark mode styles, typography, and utility text-shadow classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, Internet Identity, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/ContactSubmissi: Admin page for viewing, filtering, and refreshing normal and junk contact form submissions with access control.
frontend/src/pages/offers/ChooseYourOwnA: Offer detail page rendering SEO metadata, styled article content, and a CTA for the 'choose-your-own-adventure' offer.
frontend/src/pages/offers/FlexibleAsHell: Offer detail page showing the 'flexible-as-hell' content with SEO setup, article sections, and a CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/OffTheBeatenPa: Offer detail page displaying 'off-the-beaten-path' content with SEO metadata, article layout, and a CTA.
frontend/src/pages/offers/PrivateAndPers: Renders the Private and Personal offer page using shared layout, SEO setup, and dynamic content from offerPosts.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StayYourWayPag: Renders the Stay Your Way offer page with SEO metadata and dynamic sections sourced from offerPosts.
frontend/src/pages/offers/StoriesAndBant: Renders the Stories and Banter offer page, displaying post content, sections, and a CTA with shared styling.
frontend/src/types/recaptcha.d.ts: Adds TypeScript definitions for the global grecaptcha object with ready and execute methods.
frontend/src/utils/formatTimestamp.ts: Converts a bigint nanosecond timestamp to a formatted local date-time string.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility helpers for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, animations, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines current project state, feature requests, issues, and architectural notes for the contact form and admin panel work.
